channel.title: Issues?
channel.description:
i've gotten errors of like: Warning: require_once(/home/www-data/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/Sources/Load.php) [function.require-once]: failed to open stream: Permission denied in /home/www-data/htdocs/moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php on line 77
for the past 30 minutes or so. are monkeys at work on your server, mitb?

item.title: Issues?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ve been modifying and changing things quite a bit today, that is the cause of all of the errors. There is a brief amount of time between when I hit ‘save’ and when I fix the permissions on the files I am editing.

Read full topic

item.title: Issues?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:3, topic:434514”]server shutdown in progress[/quote]then error connecting to mysql database

it’s like its restarting every few minutes (at least that’s what the messages say), dunno whats going on

EDIT - seems to have stopped now

Read full topic

item.description:

server has just been rebooted,
